source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Icebound Fortitude for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 12 sec.

Set: Luck of the Draw! has 2 sec increased duration.

While Luck of the Draw! is active, Death Strike costs 10 less Runic Power and can strike up to 2 additional nearby enemies.

spells.description: Equip: Receiving direct healing from allies has a high chance to restore 3,125 mana to your ally and grant you both 403 Versatility for 10 sec.

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Icebound Fortitude for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 12 sec.

Set: Luck of the Draw! has 2 sec increased duration.

While Luck of the Draw! is active, Death Strike costs 10 less Runic Power and can strike up to 2 additional nearby enemies.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 117,913 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,367 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 194 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

name: Chromebustible Bomb Suit

spells.description:
Use: Rapidly deploy the bomb suit to reduce damage taken by 75% for 20 sec or until 9.6 million damage has been prevented.

Upon depletion, the bomb suit detonates to deal 848,406 Fire damage split between nearby enemies. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

description: When the only options are initial success or total failure.

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Jaithys, the Prison Blade
